QuestData.Title: Hunting Tactics: Blessing of Ohn'ahra
QuestData.Description: Your renown with the Maruuk grows. Listen closely, and I will teach you to call upon a blessing of Ohn'ahra to protect you and your allies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Select a blessing of Ohn'ahra for use in the Grand Hunt.
QuestData.RewardText:
May the winds of Ohn'ahra guide and protect you.
Return when your renown grows, and I will train you further.
